Description: This corpus contains readings of written texts performed by French and English native speakers.

Corpus: LeaP: The Learning the Prosody of a Foreign Language
Description: This corpus contains recordings of English and German spoken by non-native speakers from 31 different native language backgrounds.#SEP The corpus is available for download from the Language Archive.
This corpus contains recordings of counterfactual sentences.

Language: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Arabic, Spanish, Hungarian, Japanese, Thai, Norwegian, Chinese
Description: This corpus contains paragraph readings by participants in both their L1 and in as many L2 as they felt they could manage.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Ortolang.

Language: German (L2 and L1), English, Polish, Italian (L1)
Description: This corpus contains L1 and L2 transcripts and audio recordings of spoken German academic discourse, as well as L1 data of spoken English, Polish, and Italian academic discourse.
